DOC.brief_summary: We assess whether oral supplementation Polypodium leucotomos , commercially market fern extract , improve facial melasma Hispanic woman moderate severe melasma . Subjects randomized either Group 1 , receive oral Polypodium leucotomos extract plus topical sunscreen , Group 2 , receive oral placebo plus topical sunscreen . The study last 12 week , hypothesize Polypodium leucotomos group improvement melasma compare placebo group .
